column4: hey all, does anyone know how to get past the 'it seems that you do not have the hardware required to run unity.' screen
now my g/f did an update recently which required a restart and now she can't get past this part
no login prompt, just brings up that error
i dont think #ubuntu is for fixing girlfriends
yes I realise that I'll deal with her later ;)
unless ur girlfriend is ubuntu.. then u really have the right to flame in here
but this is the reason why your gf's have their own laptops
thanks this is her laptop which has the issue...
just backup her data&settings and reinst..
and backup /etc /var/mail etc.. whatever needs be..
there has to be a back door here somehwere lol
for all i know she used sid repos..
an update appeared and she clicked ok sure update...
unless you're challenging or man enough to check things out with debootstrap and live rescuecd..
I like a challenge, but unfortunately a little notebook pc without a cdrom drive becomes more of a challenge
